name: Daily Movie Quote Messages
elements: â€œYou know what the happiest animal on Earth is? It's a goldfish. It has a 10-second memory. Be a goldfish.â€œ - Ted Lasso

â€œI believe whatever doesnâ€™t kill you, simply makes youâ€¦stranger.â€ â€“ The Dark Knight, The Joker
